definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: You will need all of your work space free from clutter.
sentences.chinese: 你工作的空間不能亂糟糟的。

sentences.english: The most frightful thoughts rushed pell-mell through his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他頭腦裏出現了一陣亂糟糟的無比恐怖的想法。

sentences.english: The vestibule was filled with the unseemly sounds of scuffling and drunken, husky gasping.
sentences.chinese: 過廳充滿了一片亂糟糟的喧囂和醉漢嘶啞的喘息聲。

sentences.english: All his books lumbered on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他所有的書亂糟糟地堆在書桌上。

sentences.english: A whole valley of boulders tossed higgledy-piggledy as though by some giant.
sentences.chinese: 滿山谷的大石頭像被巨人亂糟糟地亂扔一樣。

sentences.english: My sister lifts her head to get a gulp of air, pushing her mess of brown curls out of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹擡起頭吸一大口氣，撩開她亂糟糟的褐色捲髮。

sentences.english: The room is in a mess.
My sister lifts her head to get a gulp of air, pushing her mess of brown curls out of the way. Her eyes focus on the window—no, on me.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹擡起頭吸一大口氣，撩開她亂糟糟的褐色捲髮。

sentences.english: Other potential avenues, such as loop quantum gravity, are also proving untidy.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個有點看頭的“圈量子引力”，也還是亂糟糟。

sentences.english: He thrust clothes higgledy-piggledy into plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服亂糟糟地塞進塑膠袋。

sentences.english: This room is a mess. It's about time you tidied up a bit.
sentences.chinese: 這個房間亂糟糟的，你該收拾一下了。

definition: billowing smoke (idiom)/foul atmosphere/(fig.) murky atmosphere/in a turmoil
to be an irksome presence (i.e. sth or sb one wishes were not there)
dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
